DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare BioMatrix Flex ( Biolimus A9-Eluting ) stent system Cypher SELECT ( Sirolimus-Eluting ) stent system non-inferiority trial .
DOC.brief_title: Limus Eluted From A Durable Versus ERodable Stent Coating
DOC.detailed_description: Compare safety efficacy BioMatrix Flex ( Biolimus A9-Eluting ) stent system Cypher SELECT ( Sirolimus-Eluting ) stent system prospective , multi-center , randomize , control , non-inferiority trial patient undergo percutaneous coronary intervention routine clinical practice .
DOC.criteria: Age > = 18 year ; Symptomatic coronary artery disease include patient chronic stable angina , silent ischemia , acute coronary syndrome include nonST elevation myocardial infarction STelevation myocardial infarction ; Presence one coronary artery stenoses > 50 % native coronary artery saphenous bypass graft 2.25 3.5 mm diameter cover one multiple stent ; No limitation number treat lesion , vessel , lesion length Pregnancy ; Known intolerance aspirin , clopidogrel , heparin , stainless steel , Sirolimus , Biolimus contrast material ; Inability provide informed consent ; Currently participate another trial reach first endpoint ; Planned surgery within 6 month PCI unless dual antiplatelet therapy maintain throughout perisurgical period
